oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Early Bird Show - 1953-04-29 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 7247th broadcast of WFAA's Early Bird Show. Originally broadcast 1953-04-29, part 2. Featuring announcer John Allen, hosts Elmer Baughman as Mister Hack Berry and Ben McCleskey as Little Willie, and performers Bob Shelton, Lynn Hoyt, Bert Noyd, George Kent, the Quartet, and the Early Bird Orchestra directed by "Deacon" Wilbur Ard. Sponsored by Earl Hayes Chevrolet and Mennen Co.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bob Shelton; Elmer Baughman; Early Bird Orchestra; "Deacon" Wilbur Ard; Bert Noyd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Station announcement -- Mennen Shave Products jingle -- Mennen Skin Bracer jingle -- John Allen introduces Bob Shelton -- Comedy routine (Bob Shelton, Hack Berry) -- Why Don't You Love Me (Bob Shelton) -- Hack Berry, Little Willie, and John Allen talk -- It's All In The Game (Early Bird Orchestra) -- Little Willie talks -- Mennen Deodorant commercial -- Hack Berry and "Deacon" Wilbur Ard talk -- Just A Kid Named Joe ("Deacon" Wilbur Ard, Early Bird Orchestra) -- Hack Berry and Little Willie talk -- The Bells Of St. Mary's (Bert Noyd piano) -- Mennen Products commercial (John Allen) -- Mennen Shave Products jingle -- Station announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WFAA (Radio station : Dallas, Tex.); Early bird show (Radio program); Early Bird Orchestra; Baughman, Elmer; McCleskey, Ben; Shelton, Bob, 1909-1983; Hoyt, Lynn; Ard, Deacon Wilbur; Kuesel, George Kent; Noyd, Bert
